definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 fa1 guang1 cai2 liao4

sentences.english: The gold glinted in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 金子在陽光下閃閃發光。

sentences.english: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the sinking sun.
sentences.chinese: 高大的哥特式窗戶在夕陽的照耀下閃閃發光。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化學發光免疫分析法測血清總睾酮。

sentences.english: High efficient to light, hight color index, energy-saving.
sentences.chinese: 具有發光率高，顯色指數高，節能優良性能。

sentences.english: The wet grass sparkles in the sun.
Objective To establish a test model for phototoxic agents with the method of chemiluminescence.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立化學發光法檢測藥物光毒性的模型。

sentences.english: We are interested in producing signage known as Electroluminescent ( EL ).
sentences.chinese: 我們對生產電致發光信號感興趣。
火箭閃閃發光升入夜空。

sentences.english: The night side of the Moon, also, under certain circumstance, shows some luminescence phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 月面的夜區在某些情況下也會顯出某種發光現象。

sentences.english: Is a professional manufacturer of LED light emitting diode of the high-tech enterprise of electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 是專業生產LED發光二極管電子產品的高科技企業。

sentences.english: Photorealistic and sparkly screen-printed graphics at front.
sentences.chinese: 閃閃發光的真實感和絲網印刷在前面的圖形。

sentences.english: Her face glowed when she came out of the sauna.
sentences.chinese: 當她從桑拿浴中出來時她的臉在發光。

sentences.english: His recent product, the high-tech light-emitting wallpaper, assures us of a revitalizing recovery.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新產品是高科技發光牆紙，保證讓你恢復活力。

sentences.english: Single-prong solid brass square buckle in gleaming silver-colored metal.
sentences.chinese: 單管齊下閃閃發光的銀色實心黃銅方扣，有色金屬。

sentences.english: The broadening of emission region is predicted.
sentences.chinese: 理論上預言發光區將隨形成時間加寬。

sentences.english: The turquoise stones gleamed brightly against the pallor of his palm as he spread the ornament before her.
sentences.chinese: 藍綠色的寶石在他蒼白的手掌中熠熠發光。

definition: to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
